      • crossValidation

        public double crossValidation(int k,
                     double threshhold)
        Parameters:
        k - : cross validation based on k group
        threshhold - : leafnode entropy will be no more than threshhold
        Returns:
        accuracy of this cross validation

      • printCrossValidationResult

        public void printCrossValidationResult(int k,
                              double threshhold,
                              java.lang.String filename)
        print cross validation result to a file named _crossValidationResult.csv it is in the same folder as inputfile
        Parameters:
        k - : cross validation based on k group
        threshhold - : use this to stop splitting, leaf node entropy will be no more than threshhold
        filename - : input file name

      • getBestThreshhold

        public double[] getBestThreshhold(double start,
                         double end,
                         int times)
        Get the best threshhold so as to get the highest cross validation accuracy we will try every threshhold value from start to end for many times, and record the best result
        Parameters:
        tree - : all data has been loaded to this tree
        start - : start point for entropy threshhold
        end - : end point for entropy threshhold
        times: - interval of every step = (end - start) / times
        Returns:
        a double array, array[0] = highest accuracy, array[1] = best threshhold

      • getBestThreshhold

        public double[] getBestThreshhold(java.lang.String filename,
                         int times)
        Get best threshhold that maximize the accuracy of cross validation
        Parameters:
        filename - : filename of data
        times - : steps of optimization, usually it is 1000

      • generateBestTree

        public void generateBestTree(java.lang.String filename,
                    int times)
        Generate best tree and print it to a file the new file's name is generated based on given filename it is placed in the same path of given filename only difference is that it will have name like _result.txt
        Parameters:
        filename - : path and filename of the data
        times - : steps used to optimize threshhold

      • generateClassification

        public void generateClassification(java.lang.String filename)
        will print classification result to a file named _result.csv
        Parameters:
        filename - of testData
